Base SDK
=================
An base sdk to communicate with http apis

## Versions
### 1.1.0 [2017-08-22]
Added ConvertTimeToVAPITimestamp to convert to VAPI timestamp string

### 1.0.0 [2016-07-06]
BREAKING CHANGE: Contexts must be provided to get/post calls -- this enables tracing


### 0.X.X
Missing history
